00016 /* the main class Configuration */
00017 
00018 class Configuration 
00019 
00020 {public :
00021   int nbvar;
00022  int trynumber;
00024 /* the current values of the variables : implemented with an array of integers*/
00025   int* config;
00027 /* the configuration value */
00028   int valuation;
00029   int var_conflict_size;
00031 /* the variables taking part to a conflict : implemented with a vector */
00032    vector<int> var_conflict;    
00033    set<int> set_var_conflict;
00035 /* indicates if the configuration has been regrouped before (for GWW) */
00036   int regrouped;
00037   virtual ~Configuration();
00038   Configuration();
00039   Configuration(int nbvar);
00041 /* copy a configuration config2 into this */
00042   virtual void copy_element (Configuration* config2);
00044 /* initialization to 0 of the conflict datastructure */
00045   virtual void init_conflicts ();
00047 /* store the conflict of (var,val) incremented by incr */
00048   virtual void incr_conflicts (int var, int val, int index, int incr);
00049 
00051 /* store the number of conflicts nbconf of (var,val) in the conflict datastructure */
00052   virtual  void set_conflicts (int var, int val, int index, int nbconf);
00053 
00055 /* get the number of conflicts (var,val) stored in the conflict datastructure*/
00056   virtual  int get_conflicts (int var, int val, int index);
00058 /* get the number of conflicts of (var,val), computed if not stored */
00059   virtual  int get_conflicts_problem (OpProblem* problem, int var, int val);
00060 
00062 /* update the conflict datastructure after a move is done */
00063   virtual void update_conflicts(OpProblem* problem, Move* move);
00064 };

00120 /* root class Move */
00121 class Move 
00122 {public :
00123  int valuation;
00124  Move();
00125  virtual ~Move() {;};
00127 /* the test of equality of a move (used for searching a move in the tabu list) */
00128  virtual int eqmove(Move* move1);
00130 /* copy of move move1 into this */
00131  virtual void copymove(Move* move);
00133 /* the move to be put in the tabu list (to be implemented in the subclasses)*/
00134  virtual Move* computetabumove(Configuration* config){return 0;};
00135 };
00136 
00138 /* class CSPMove : a classical move for a CSP : variable, value */
00139 class CSPMove : public Move
00140 {public :
00141  int variable;
00142  int value;
00143  CSPMove();
00144  ~CSPMove() {;};
00145  int eqmove(Move* move);
00146  void copymove (Move* move);
00148 /* the move stored is the inverse of the move done */
00149  Move* computetabumove(Configuration* config);
00150 };

00154 /* Root class of Optimization Problems (minimization) */
00155 
00156 class OpProblem 
00157 {public :
00159 /* the best configuration found */
00160   Configuration* best_config;
00162 /* the number of variables */
00163   int nbvar;  
00165 /* maximum domain size */
00166   int domainsize;
00168 /* given lower bound , is used as a stop condition when it is reached */
00169   int lower_bound;
00171 /* the current move being tested */
00172   Move* currentmove;
00174 /* the first feasible move tried in the neighborhood */
00175   Move* firstmove;
00177 /* the best move found in the neighborhood */
00178   Move* bestmove;
00179   OpProblem(){};
00180   virtual ~OpProblem(){};
00182 /* move execution (modification of the current configuration) */
00183   virtual void move_execution(Configuration* configuration, Move* move);
00185 /* update of  the conflict data structure (case IncrCSPConfiguration) */
00186   virtual void incr_update_conflicts(IncrCSPConfiguration* configuration,Move* move){};
00188 /* update of  the conflict data structure (case FullincrCSPConfiguration) */
00189   virtual void fullincr_update_conflicts(FullincrCSPConfiguration* configuration,Move* move){};
00191 /* creation of 3 Move objects (currentmove,bestmove,firstmove) */
00192   virtual void allocate_moves();
00194 /* creation of 1 Move object (the class of the Move depends on the problem) : this method
00195 is implemented in subclasses */
00196   virtual Move* create_move(){return 0;};
00198 /* adjustment of the neighborhood parameters (when the size of the actual neighborhood is greater than maxneighbors) */
00199   virtual void adjust_parameters(Configuration* configuration, int & maxneighbors, int & minneighbors){};
00201 /* next move to be tested (implemented in subclasses)*/
00202   virtual void next_move(Configuration* configuration, Move* move, NeighborhoodSearch* nbhs){}; 
00204 /* random assignment of the variables of a configuration */
00205   virtual void random_configuration(Configuration* configuration){};
00207 /* analysis of the best configuration */
00208   virtual void best_config_analysis(){};
00210 /* writing the best solution */
00211   virtual void best_config_write(){};
00212 
00214 /* verification of the best solution (its cost is recomputed) */
00215   virtual void best_config_verification();
00217 /* initialization of the population of size populationsize */
00218   virtual void init_population (Configuration** population,int populationsize) {};
00220 /* create a configuration (the exact class depends on the problem and must defined in subclasses) */
00221   virtual Configuration* create_configuration(){return 0;};
00223 /* computation of the participation of (var,val) to the configuration evaluation */
00224   virtual int compute_conflict (Configuration* configuration,int var, int val) {return 0;};
00226 /* evaluation of a configuration */
00227   virtual int config_evaluation(Configuration* configuration) {return 0;};
00229 /* evaluation of a configuration if the move is done */
00230   virtual int move_evaluation (Configuration* configuration,Move* move){return 0;};
00232 /* valueindex in the domain to value */
00233   virtual int index2value (int index, int var) {return index;};
00235 /* valueindex of value in its domain*/
00236   virtual int value2index(int value,int var) {return value;};
00238 /* compute the variables participating to a conflict in the configuration */
00239   virtual void compute_var_conflict (Configuration* configuration) {};
00240   virtual int tabuindex(Move* move, Configuration* configuration) {return 0;};
00241   virtual int tabuinverseindex(Move* move, Configuration* configuration){return 0;};
00242   virtual int nbtabuindex(){return 0;};
00243 };

00247 /* Class NeighborhoodSearch : how the neighborhood is explored */
00248 
00249 class NeighborhoodSearch
00250 {public :
00252 /* minimum number of visited neighbors */
00253   int minneighbors;
00255 /* maximum number of explored neighbors */
00256   int maxneighbors;
00259 /* behavior indicator when the neighborhood is exhausted and no neighbor has been accepted :
00260 0 stagnation, 1 the 1st feasible move is selected, k the best feasible among k tried but not accepted moves is selected */
00261   int finished;
00263 /* restriction indicator to variables participating in a conflict (0 no restriction, 1 restriction) */
00264   int var_conflict;
00266 /* restriction indicator to best values of a variable (0 no restriction , 1 restriction) */
00267   int val_conflict;
00268   double nbhrate;
00269   NeighborhoodSearch( int maxneigh, int minneigh, int finish, int var_conf, int val_conf, double nbbr);
00270   int returnbestmove();
00271   void adjust_neighborhood(Configuration* configuration, OpProblem* problem, int& maxneigh, int& minneigh, int nbmoves);
00272   virtual void dynamicmaxneighbors(int & maxneigh, int & minneigh, int nbmoves);
00273   virtual void initsearch();
00274   virtual void spareneighboradjust(Configuration* config, Move* move){;}
00275 };

00294 /* adjust the parameters maxneighbors and minneighbors */

00296 };

00308 
00309 class IncompleteAlgorithm
00310 {public :
00311   string methodname;
00314 /* a threshold can be used to forbid moves above this threshold (used in LSAlgorithms implementing walks inside GWW)*/
00315   int threshold;
00316   virtual ~IncompleteAlgorithm(){};
00318 /* walk for a particule */
00319   virtual void randomwalk (OpProblem* problem, Configuration* configuration);
00320   virtual void initthreshold(Configuration** population, int popsize){;};
00322 /* Run the algorithm on a population (array of configurations) */
00323   virtual void run (OpProblem *problem,Configuration ** population);
00324 
00325 };

00329 /* The class of local search algorithm on one particle : the random walk is 
00330 parameterized with the walk lengh,a neighborhood and a metaheuristics */
00331 
00332 class LSAlgorithm: public IncompleteAlgorithm
00333 {public :
00335 /* walk length */
00336   int walklength;
00338 /* the way the neighborhood is explored */
00339   NeighborhoodSearch * nbhsearch;  
00341 /* the metaheuristics used */
00342   Metaheuristic* mheur;
00344 /* number of move tries  (for statistics) */
00345   int nhtries;
00346   double avgnhtries;
00347   double avgsqnhtries;
00349 /* number of moves done */
00350   int nbmoves;
00351   LSAlgorithm(int nbmov);
00352   ~LSAlgorithm();
00354 /* feasability of a move (under or at threshold level pour GWW walks) */
00355   virtual int isfeasible(Move* move);
00356   void randomwalk   (OpProblem* problem, Configuration* configuration);
00359 /* Neighborhood exploration algorithm for selecting and do a move from the current configuration :
00360 returns 1 if a move has been done and 0 if no move has been done */
00361   virtual int configurationmove(OpProblem* problem,Configuration* configuration);
00362   void initthreshold(Configuration** population, int popsize);
00363   void run (OpProblem *problem, Configuration ** population);
00365 /* test if a global best configuration has been found (returns 1 in that case) */
00366   int test_bestfound(Move* move);
00367 
00368 
00369 };

00378 /* Root class for Metaheuritics */
00379 class Metaheuristic
00380 {public :
00381   virtual ~Metaheuristic(){};
00383 /* update of the metaheuristic data just before a move is performed */
00384   virtual void executebeforemove(Move* move, Configuration* configuration,OpProblem* problem);
00386 /* initialization of the meteheuristic data at the beginning of a local search */
00387   virtual void reinit(OpProblem* problem);
00389 /* acceptance condition of a move : returns 1 if the move is accepted */
00390   virtual int acceptance(Move* move,Configuration*  config);
00391   virtual void adjustparameter (int parameter) {;};
00392 };
00393 
00396 /* Walk with using a tabu list : this list of moves is implemented by a list<Move*> structure , the
00397 actual class of the moves depend on the problems */
00398 class TabuSearch: public Metaheuristic
00399 {public :
00401 /* maximum length of the tabulist */
00402   int tabulength;
00404 /* tabu list : implemented FIFO */
00405   list<Move*> move_list;
00406   TabuSearch(int tabul);
00408 /* acceptance of a move : not in the tabulist (the aspiration criterion of a best is in the configurationmove algorithm) */
00409   int acceptance (Move* move, Configuration* config);
00411 /* test of non presence in the tabulist (use of eqmove method) */
00412   int  nontabumove (Move* move);
00414 /* updating of the tabulist which is managed as a FIFO of maximum length tabulength */
00415   void executebeforemove(Move* move, Configuration* configuration, OpProblem* problem);
00417 /* the tabu list is cleared */
00418   void reinit(OpProblem* problem);
00419   void adjustparameter (int length);
00420 };
00421

00423 {public :
00424   TabuGreedySearch(int tabul);
00425  int acceptance (Move* move, Configuration* config);
00426 };

00436   void reinit(OpProblem* problem);

00446 /* Metropolis algorithm : a unique parameter - a constant temperature */
00447 class Metropolis: public Metaheuristic
00448 {public :
00449   double temperature;
00450   Metropolis(double temp);
00453 /* the classical Metropolis formula for accepting a bad move :  probability =  exp (-evaluationdelta/temperature) */
00454   int acceptance (Move* move, Configuration* config);
00455   void adjustparameter(int parameter);
00456 };
00457 
00461 /* Threshold accepting Metaheuristics : a move must no deteriorate the evaluation more than the
00462 current threshod : the threshold goes down linearly from thresholdinit to 0 */
00463 class ThresholdAccepting: public Metaheuristic
00464 {public :
00466 /* initial threshold */
00467   double thresholdinit;
00469 /* constant step to lower the threshold */
00470   double delta;
00472 /* current value of the threshold */
00473   double thresholdaccept; // le seuil tel que géré par TA
00476 /* constructor : two arguments : maxthreshold the initial threshold and 
00477 walklength , it computes a constant step for lowering the threshold */
00478   ThresholdAccepting(double maxthreshold, int walklength);
00480 /* acceptance condition : being under or at the threshold */
00481   int acceptance (Move* move,Configuration* config);
00483 /* the threshold is lowered by delta */
00484   void executebeforemove(Move* move, Configuration * configuration, OpProblem* problem);
00486 /* the threshold is initialized at thresholdinit */
00487   void reinit(OpProblem* problem);
00488 };
00489 
00491 /* Simulated Annealing : linear temperature descent from inittemperature to 0*/
00492 class SimulatedAnnealing: public Metaheuristic
00493 {public :
00495 /* initial temperature */
00496   double inittemperature;
00498 /* constant step for lowering the temperature */ 
00499   double delta;
00501 /* current temperature */
00502   double temperature; 
00503   int walklength; 
00505 /* Constructor : 2 parameters  : initial temperature and walk length : the fixed
00506 temperature decrement is computed. */
00507   SimulatedAnnealing(double initialtemperature, int walklength);
00512 /* Acceptance function of the temperature : classical simulated annealing formula
00513 for accepting a bad move :  probability =  exp (-temperature/evaluationdelta) */
00514   int acceptance (Move* move, Configuration* config);
00516 /* the temperature is lowered by delta */
00517   void executebeforemove(Move* move, Configuration * configuration, OpProblem* problem);
00518   void reinit(OpProblem* problem);
00519   void adjustparameter (int parameter);
00520 };

00529 class TabuAcceptingrate: public TabuSearch
00530 {public :

00533   float Pd;       
00535   /* probability of acceptance of a move with same cost */
00536   float P0;        
00537   TabuAcceptingrate(int tabul, float Pd, float P0);
00539 /* Acceptance condition : non tabu and probabilities depending on the move direction */
00540   int acceptance (Move* move, Configuration* config);
00541 };

00545 /* Random walk : every feasible neighbor is accepted */
00546 class RandomSearch: public Metaheuristic
00547 {public :
00548   RandomSearch();
00549   int acceptance (Move* move, Configuration* config);
00550 };

00553 /* Greedy walk : a neighbor with better or same cost as the current configuration is accepted */
00554 class GreedySearch: public Metaheuristic
00555 {public :
00556   GreedySearch();
00557   int acceptance (Move* move, Configuration* config);
00558 };

00562 
00567 /* the GWW (Go with the winners) algorithms : the different subclasses 
00568 differ by the way a threshold is managed and the particles are regrouped */
00569 
00570 class GWWAlgorithm: public IncompleteAlgorithm
00571 {public :
00573 /* number of particles */
00574   int populationsize;
00577 /* walk indicator : a walk is performed only is the particle has been regrouped : (1 yes, 0 no)
00578 (useful for a standard GWW with random walk (and no local search)) */
00579   int regrouptest;
00581 /* parameter if the threshold is lowered at the last move of the walk 
00582 (for trying to avoid the particle to be redistributed  (1 yes, 0 no)*/
00583   int lastmovedescent;
00585 /* elitism parameter : is the best particle put again in the population at each regroupment ( 1 yes, 0 no) */
00586   int elitism;
00588 /* parameter for stopping the walk in case of stagnation (1 yes, 0 no) */ 
00589   int nomovestop;
00591 /* the threshold decrement (compted by thresholdcomputedelta) */
00592   int thresholddelta;
00594 /* the maximum number of iterations : useful when no threshold is managed (NothresholdGWWAlgorithm) */
00595   int nbiteration;
00597 /* number of threshold changes (for the statistics) */
00598   int thresholdchanges;
00600 /* total number of move tries between 2 regroupments (for the statistics) */
00601   int total_nhtries;
00603 /* total number of moves between 2 regroupments (for the statistics) */
00604   int total_nbmoves;
00606 /* the local search algorithm used */
00607   LSAlgorithm* walkalgorithm;
00609   ~GWWAlgorithm();
00611 /* local search on the whole population */
00612   virtual  void populationrandomwalk (OpProblem* problem, Configuration** population);
00614 /* the number of particles at the threshold (for statistics) , the population being yet sorted at the function call*/
00615   virtual int nb_threshold_population(Configuration** population);
00617 /* a local search for a particle */
00618   void randomwalk   (OpProblem* problem, Configuration* configuration);
00620 /* intialization of the threshold */
00621   void initthreshold(Configuration** population, int popsize);
00623 /* method for lowering the threshold( the delta has already been computed) */
00624   virtual void thresholdupdate();
00626 /* method for computing the threshold decrement */
00627   virtual void thresholdcomputedelta(Configuration** population);
00629 /* main function for running the algorithm */
00630   void run (OpProblem *problem, Configuration** population);
00632 /* regrouping of the best particles on the good ones */
00633   virtual  void regrouping(Configuration** population);
00635 /* in case of elitism, the best particle is put into the population */
00636   void populationkeepbest (OpProblem* problem, Configuration** population);
00638 /* incrementing the threshold updates counter (for the statistics) */
00639   virtual  void thresholdchangesupdate();
00640 };
00641 
00643 /* Abstract class : GWW managing a threshold */
00644 class ThresholdGWWAlgorithm : public GWWAlgorithm
00645 {public :
00646   void thresholdupdate();
00647 void thresholdchangesupdate();
00648 void initthreshold(Configuration** population, int popsize);
00649 int nb_threshold_population(Configuration** population);
00650 };

00654 /* Standard GWW : threshold descent with a fixed rate */
00655 class StandardGWWAlgorithm : public ThresholdGWWAlgorithm
00656 {public :
00658 /* threshold descent constant rate */
00659   double thresholddescent;
00661 /* minimum of the threshold (corresponds generally to a known lowerbound) */
00662   int thresholdmin;  
00663   void regrouping(Configuration** population);
00664   StandardGWWAlgorithm(int population_size, int grtest,int lastmove, int elitisme,int stop, double thresdescent,int threshmin );
00665   void thresholdcomputedelta(Configuration** population);
00666 };
00667 
00669 /* StandardGWW with a threshold descent at least until the worst particle */
00670 class FastStandardGWWAlgorithm: public StandardGWWAlgorithm
00671 {public :
00672    void thresholdcomputedelta(Configuration** population);
00673    FastStandardGWWAlgorithm(int population_size, int grtest,int lastmove, int elitisme, int stop, double thresdescent,int threshmin );  
00674 };
00675 
00677 /* GWW with a threshold descent such as a given number of particles is regrouped */
00678 class AdaptiveGWWAlgorithm : public ThresholdGWWAlgorithm
00679 { public :
00681 /* number of bad particles to be regrouped on good ones */
00682   int nbkilled;
00683   AdaptiveGWWAlgorithm(int population_size, int grtest, int lastmove, int elitisme, int stop, int nbkilled );
00684   void regrouping(Configuration** population);
00685   void thresholdcomputedelta(Configuration** population);
00686 };
00687 
00690 /* GWW with a threshold descent at the lowest value obtained by AdaptiveGWWAlgorithm et FastStandardGWWAlgorithm
00691 using a number of particles to be redistributed and a rate */
00692 class FastAdaptGWWAlgorithm: public AdaptiveGWWAlgorithm
00693 {public :
00695 /* threshold descent rate */
00696   double thresholddescent;
00697   int nbmaxkilled;
00698   FastAdaptGWWAlgorithm(int population_size, int grtest, int lastmove, int elitisme, int stop, int nbkilled, int maxkilled, double thresholddescent);
00699   void thresholdcomputedelta(Configuration** population);
00700 };
00701 
00703 /* GWW with a descent depending on a distance between the worst and the median particle */
00704 class MedianAdaptGWWAlgorithm: public AdaptiveGWWAlgorithm
00705 {public :
00707 /* descent rate : porcentage of the distance between the worst and the median particles (between 0 and 1) */
00708   double mediandescent;
00709   MedianAdaptGWWAlgorithm(int population_size, int grtest, int lastmove, int elitisme, int stop, double mediandescent);
00710   void thresholdcomputedelta(Configuration** population);
00711 };
00712 
00714 /* GWW with a descent depending on a distance between the worst and the best particle */
00715 class BestAdaptGWWAlgorithm: public AdaptiveGWWAlgorithm
00716 {public :
00718 /* descent rate : porcentage of the distance between the worst and the best particles (between 0 and 1) */
00719 
00720   double bestdescent;
00721   BestAdaptGWWAlgorithm(int population_size, int grtest, int lastmove, int elitisme, int stop, double bestdescent);
00722   void thresholdcomputedelta(Configuration** population);
00723 };

00728 /* GWW without threshold management : 2 parameters : number of particles redistributed at each iteration , number of iterations */
00729 class NothresholdGWWAlgorithm : public GWWAlgorithm 
00730 {public :
00731   NothresholdGWWAlgorithm(int population_size, int grtest, int lastmove, int elitisme, int stop,
00732         int killed,  int nbiter);
00733   void regrouping(Configuration** population);
00735 /* number of particles to be regrouped at each iteration */
00736   int nbkilled;
00737 };
